class.name: CbType
class.description: Callback type identifier for Constraint/Shape/Body's over which callback listeners are applied

detail.description: Unique integer id for each CbType instantiated
List of all active shapes using this CbType. Active shapes referring to those currently in a Space
List of all active compounds using this CbType. Active compounds referring to those currently in a Space
List of all active bodies using this CbType. Active bodies referring to those currently in a Space
List of all active constraints using this CbType. Active constraints referring to those currently in a Space with active=true
List of all active listeners using this CbType. Active listeneres referring to those currently in a Space
Don't see why anyone would need this, but whatever. Returns CbType from the unique id associated with it.
